Articles.Content:
The KSP website has gone to HTML mode!

Here is a screenshot:

[![image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg](http://i1374.photobucket.com/albums/ag401/Engineer-Of-Stuff/image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg)](http://s1374.photobucket.com/user/Engineer-Of-Stuff/media/image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg.html)

> 
> The KSP website has gone to HTML mode!
> Here is a screenshot:
> 
> http://s1374.photobucket.com/user/Engineer-Of-Stuff/media/image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg.html[http://i1374.photobucket.com/albums/ag401/Engineer-Of-Stuff/image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg](http://i1374.photobucket.com/albums/ag401/Engineer-Of-Stuff/image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg)

Yeah I've gotten that too. I think it's on your end since when I flip to wifi and not cellular data I get the floating Kerbal image. Same with my desktop computer.

> 
> Yeah I've gotten that too. I think it's on your end since when I flip to wifi and not cellular data I get the floating Kerbal image. Same with my desktop computer.

The floating Kerbal is my avatar.
Great time for server problems. Or can it be intentional?

> 
> Great time for server problems. Or can it be intentional?

Most likely its international.

EDIT: I thought he said "international", not "intentional".

- - - Updated - - -

What happened? Why is it showing the HTML?

> What happened? Why is it showing the HTML?

CSS is busy playing 1.0 ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
